title: I'm interested in studying space science. Which stream should I take in my 11th class? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to pursue a career in space science best combination of subjects to be taken in class 11th will be physics, chemistry and maths known as PCM in science stream. And also research and get information about how to proceed further after class 12 now only and aim to get the best institution for it like IIST
I believe you should opt for PCM because studying space science requires knowledge of all the three subjects combined. hope you enjoy highschool
